about_the_game:
Tower defense game revisiting the genre for both gamers nostalgic of the old sweet TD days and newcomers.

Defend your kingdom, customize your towers and play online or offline in this tribute to the Tower Defense genre.

How would you like to play an old-school Tower Defense where you can play with your friends and create your own towers to craft new strategies?

Towers Heritage is a tribute to the classics of the genre while adding a dose of innovation with an online multiplayer mode or a unique tower creation workshop.

Immerse yourself in a fantasy world where, as protector of the kingdom, you must defend your lands against relentless waves of enemies. Strategically place your towers along the paths or build an overwhelming maze of destruction.

Not in the mood to play with other players? No problem!

🏰 Take on bots in a skirmish mode.

🏰 Enjoy the single-player adventure with a captivating campaign mode.

🏰 Or create your game with your own rules: choose the number of players, the type of game (cooperative, team against team, free for all) and much more.

Looking for a completely different challenge? Become the invader! Unleash waves of enemies on your opponents and expand your kingdom.

Developed by a passionate indie from the heart of the French countryside, Towers Heritage is a personnal tribute this genre, that tag along since his childhood.

Whether you want to enjoy a chill game or a real strategic challenge, there's something for everyone.

⚔️ Add to your wishlist now and take a seat among legends of TD.⚔️
